content: Vessels come as they are, and as they are extremely strong already you should be more than able to feel the effect of the powerful abilities during fights and bosses. There are only a handful of them in the game, however, so you will need to seek them out by finding Black Myth: Wukong's many secrets and killing some of the Black Myth: Wukong secret bosses.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fireproof_Mantle.md', within the main section titled 'Fireproof Mantle'.
The content is as follows:
Vessels come as they are, and as they are extremely strong already you should be more than able to feel the effect of the powerful abilities during fights and bosses. There are only a handful of them in the game, however, so you will need to seek them out by finding Black Myth: Wukong's many secrets and killing some of the Black Myth: Wukong secret bosses.
